1: <pb/>Kub' tq'o'n nimaqkawil Aswer tu'n kyq'onte xjal jun chojb'il, kyoju' tx'otx' ex kyoju' swejtx'otx' toj a'.
2: Tkyaqilju' tb'incha tuk'i'l toklen ex tipumal, exju' tqanil chik'lixi'x ti'ju' jun nim toklen Mardokyey oktq'o'n, tz'ib'anqe' toju' u'j janche ku'xa' tz'ib'a'na' tkyaqilju' nb'aj toju' kykawb'il Medya ex Persya
3: Ate Mardokyey aj Juda toktoq toju' tnejel oklenj ti'jxi' nimaqkawil; ok te jun nimaqxjal kyxolu' aj Juda, b'a'ntoq tilwi' kyu'nju' twnaqil, qu'n tjoyju' b'a'n teju' ttanam ex oktq'on tilil tu'n kytenju' tyajajil b'a'n.
